name: Spaceraft Simulator
description:
SPACERAFT SIMULATOR

Made for Mini Jam 97
Optional theme : simulation
Limitation : movement is lethal

Reach the other end without acceleration bursts pushing you overboard

I lacked time to add SFX, so you have to make them orally

My second godot project, you got to learn ^^'

Font : http://style64.org/c64-truetype/license
